sentences.english: You want to buy some Chinese silk and satin，don''t you？
sentences.chinese: 您想買些中國綢緞，是嗎？

sentences.english: Having the aureate cushion for leaning on of candy strip, use make it of fabrics of silks and satins .
sentences.chinese: 有着條紋圖案的金色靠墊，是用綢緞面料做成的。

sentences.english: Silks and satins put out the fire in the kitchen.
Elastic waistband features a satin drawstring for an adjustable fit.
sentences.chinese: 彈性腰帶有調節適合綢緞束帶的功能。

sentences.english: My sister's silk cheongsam is shining in the light.
sentences.chinese: 姐姐的綢緞旗袍在燈光下顯得鮮妍奪目。

sentences.english: We also take on a variety of silk piece goods.
sentences.chinese: 我們也經營各種綢緞的生意。

sentences.english: She was dressed in rich materials-satins, and lace, and silks-all of white.
sentences.chinese: 她穿的都是貴重料子，綢緞花邊一應俱全，全身雪白。

sentences.english: He bought high-grade silk for his newly wife.
sentences.chinese: 他買了上好的綾羅綢緞送給她的新婚妻子。
你看他跳華爾茲，滑溜溜的，像綢緞一樣。

sentences.english: Rafter of satin, and roof of stone.
sentences.chinese: 裹着綢緞的椽，石頭屋頂。

sentences.english: Silks and satins put out the kitchen fire.
sentences.chinese: 身上綾羅綢緞，廚下炊煙不見。

sentences.english: Silk is popular for quilt coverings.
I am dressed in a short blue silk coat.
sentences.chinese: 我穿一件短的藍色綢緞外衣。

sentences.english: Everything from cinema to silk came with a spirit of nationalism.
sentences.chinese: 從電影到綢緞衣服，愛國主義的情懷無處不在。

sentences.english: The material is chiffon and satin which gives you comfortable feeling.
sentences.chinese: 雪紡綢和綢緞的材質會給你一種舒適的感覺。

sentences.english: All the silks of Veluca, all the furs of Khudan.
sentences.chinese: 所有維魯加的綢緞，所有庫當的毛皮。

definition: batik (color printing on cloth using wax)
